name: CD Art Display Skin File
summary: Learn about .CSKIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To install a CD Art Display skin, double-click the downloaded CSKIN file in Windows. The skin is then available from the right-click menu in the CD Art Display window (Skin â†’ [the skin]).
CSKIN files are saved in a .ZIP format and can be manually decompressed and created by interchanging the ".cskin" file extension for ".zip."

description: Skin file used by CD Art Display, a program that shows CD cover art for songs played in Windows Media Player, iTunes, Winamp, and other popular audio players; contains image graphics, fonts, and a skin.ini (.INI) file that defines the appearance of the player.
